title: Creamy Avocado Dressing
ingredients: 1avocado, halved, pitted, and cut into ½-inch pieces
1teaspoon grated lemon zest, plus 3 tablespoons juice
directions: Process avocado, oil, lemon zest and juice, garlic, salt, and pepper in food processor until smooth, about 30 seconds, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Use immediately.
